thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com
thread.title: Christina

author: Christina
title: Christina
text: I have used TicketCity twice now. Once for Ed Sheeran & for Twenty One Pilots. Both times I was able to get good seats well after the original sale dates. The tickets were above face value, but not too outrageous that I wouldn't purchase them. I didn't have any problems using their site or getting into either venue which were both in different states from where I reside. I would use them again if I wanted to go to another show.
